Embedded.Line:
@ECHO OFF REM Move to the current batch file's location. CD %~dp0
REM Detect 32-bit / 64-bit, http://stackoverflow.com/a/24590583/1083771 reg Query "HKLM\Hardware\Description\System\CentralProcessor\0" | find /I "x86" > NUL && SET KEEP="BSAopt x32.exe" || SET KEEP="BSAopt x64.exe"
REM Rename the appropriate BSAopt executable file to just plain BSAopt.exe MOVE %KEEP% BSAopt.exe
REM Delete all the files in the folder except BSAopt.exe and the current batch file. FOR %%A IN (*) DO IF /I "%%A" NEQ "BSAopt.exe" IF /I "%%A" NEQ "%~f0" DEL "%%A"
REM Delete this batch file, http://stackoverflow.com/a/20333152/1083771 START /B "" cmd /c DEL "%~f0" & EXIT /B

Set.Value: -jar \"{DumpFolderForwardSlashes}/ModOrganizer/mods/Dual Sheath Redux 1.7.3/SkyProc Patchers/Dual Sheath Redux Patch/Dual Sheath Redux Patch.jar\"
{DumpFolderForwardSlashes}/ModOrganizer/mods/Dual Sheath Redux 1.7.3/SkyProc Patchers/Dual Sheath Redux Patch
